definition: (one's) last straw to clutch at/one's last hope
early season rice/rice at transplanting or still unripe
Daocheng county (Tibetan: 'dab pa rdzong) in Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘孜藏族自治州[Gan1 zi1 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Sichuan (formerly in Kham province of Tibet)
long-grained rice (Indian rice, as opposed to round-grained rice)

sentences.english: Finally, meteorological problems for throwing transplanted rice were mentioned.
sentences.chinese: 最后，提出抛秧稻生长中应注意的气象问题。

sentences.english: We will reimburse the customer for any or damage.
sentences.chinese: 我们将赔偿顾客所受稻的壹茄笋失何损害。

sentences.english: Thus natural preservation for wild rice should be established.
sentences.chinese: 而促进栽培稻的发展，必须建立野生稻自然保护区。

sentences.english: Thus natural preservation for wild rice should be established.
sentences.chinese: 而促进栽培稻的发展，必须建立野生稻自然保护区。

sentences.english: A rich straw-yellow color with gold reflections.
sentences.chinese: 丰润的稻黄色酒体掩映出金色光芒。

sentences.english: Brilliant, straw-yellow color with light green hints.
sentences.chinese: 明亮的稻黄色酒体泛着淡绿色泽。

sentences.english: The dwarf mutant was obtained from transgenic rice KMD with a crylAb gene.
sentences.chinese: 从转基因水稻“克螟稻”中获得了一个矮秆突变体。

sentences.english: It is indicated that a higher nymph population could cause more serious injure in Kemingdao 2.
sentences.chinese: 说明高密度的稻蓟马若虫将对克螟稻2号为害更严重。

sentences.english: This wine shows a straw-yellow color, with golden hues.
sentences.chinese: 淡雅的稻黄色酒体掩映出亮绿色边缘，优雅迷人。

sentences.english: All the results showed that the submergence tolerance ability of hybrid rice is superior to traditional rice.
sentences.chinese: 杂交稻耐淹涝胁迫的能力强于常规稻。

sentences.english: Common wild rice was important germplasm resource for hereditary improvement of cultivated rice.
sentences.chinese: 普通野生稻是栽培稻遗传改良的重要种质资源。

sentences.english: Mark Rice-Oxley is correct in thinking that his story will reassure sufferers.
sentences.chinese: 马克稻奥克斯利是正确的思想，他的故事将保证患者。

sentences.english: Grains,including oats and wild rice, lower the risk of heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 谷物中的包括燕麦和野生稻，能够降低心脏病的风险。

sentences.english: Diversity of reproductive factors expressed obviously among all the sampling sites of O. rufipogon Griff. in Gaozhou.
sentences.chinese: 高州野生稻各采样点的生殖特性表现出明显的多样性。

sentences.english: The in vitro culture abilities of callus induction were quite different among several Yunnan wild rice species.
sentences.chinese: 云南野生稻不同外植体愈伤组织诱导能力差别较大。

definition: early season rice/rice at transplanting or still unripe
long-grained rice (Indian rice, as opposed to round-grained rice)
